name: A Fracture In The Bone
description:
A Fracture In The Bone is a poetry game about ancestral memory, Irish heritage, fireflies and a story that survives in your bones.

It is a simulation of a half understood ache and a half remembered dream.

Play on philome.la: http://philome.la/nialljtaylor/a-fracture-in-the-b...

Warp Door: http://wip.warpdoor.com/2014/04/20/a-fracture-in-the-bone-niall-taylor/
